Text:
Just out of curiosity....Was this supposed to activate Windows 8 as well?

Because your crack did.

Basically, I tried using the WMC-free code you get from MS to activate. I used CMD and put my serial in to use for activation. It failed validation. Tried over the phone, failed again (said my Windows wasn't Genuine.) Used your crack for the Personalization and when my computer restarted, it said my serial I had was activated fully and permanently. 

Is that supposed to happen with this? Because whether it was or wasn't, it unlocked everything for Windows 8 x64 WMC and my Personalization options are unlocked too.

I really couldn't thank you enough for this.
This program activated my Windows Pro WMC but my personalisation is still unavailable.
Ok, well I installed it again and now everything is minty.
